Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns and Josh Hart each posted double-doubles for the New York Knicks.
Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 27 points and 13 rebounds in his 31st double-double of the season.
Josh Hart had 21 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists.
OG Anunoby scored 27 points against his former team, the Toronto Raptors.
Immanuel Quickley scored 22 points for the Raptors.
Scottie Barnes had 18 points and RJ Barrett finished with 16 for the Raptors.
Chris Boucher added 10 points for the Raptors, all in the final four minutes of the fourth quarter.
The Knicks mounted a 19-7 run to take the lead for good in the first quarter.
The Knicks ended the third quarter on a 25-18 run and scored 15 unanswered points in the fourth quarter.
